鴶字的基本解释

鴶
jiá
〔鴶鵴（
j?）〕布谷鸟。

鴶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiá］
［《廣韻》古黠切，入黠，見。］
(1)见“鴶鵴”。
(2)见“鴶”。

鴶字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鴶； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1488第04
【廣韻】古黠切【集韻】訖黠切，?音戛。【玉篇】鴶鵴，布穀鳥也。【爾雅·釋鳥】鳲鳩，鴶鵴。【疏】布穀類也。一名擊穀。一名桑鳩。又【集韻】激質切，音吉。義同。

鴶字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鴶字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Chen
jiá
〔鴶鵴(
j?)] Cuckoo.
Chen
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiá］
["Guangyun" cut from ancient points, enter the points, see. ]
(1) See "鴶鵴".
(2) See "鴶".
Chen
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鴶; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1488 Page 04
[Guang Yun] Ancient cut with rhyme [Ji Yun] Cut with cut, sound. [Jade articles] Cuckoo and Cuckoo. 【Erya·Shiniao】鸤鸤,鴶鴴. 【Sparse】Cuckoos are also. One hits the valley. A Sanjiu. Also 【Jiyun】excited and sharp, sound good. The same meaning.
